arts.ttl: Gazzetta: Milan coach Allegri asks for more in view of Udinese game
arts.sum: It is not the time to change the objective. To aim for something more than a return to the Champions League there will be time from March onward, depending on the turn the standings will have taken in spring. The match in Udine, however, has great importance for the Rossoneri. In the last two decades […]

arts.ttl: AC Milan’s Santiago Gimenez seeks redemption in match vs Udinese
arts.sum: The last image of Santiago Gimenez against Bologna was that chance that ended on the post after he had rounded the opposing goalkeeper. Right after came the substitution, with a few whistles from the San Siro crowd quickly drowned out by applause, started both by Luka Modric on the pitch and Massimiliano Allegri on the […]
